pullRequest.title: [FLINK-18075] Wrap the SerializationSchema in KafkaSerializationSchema in Kafka connector
pullRequest.bodyText:
What is the purpose of the change
This change wraps the SerializationSchema in a KafkaSerializationSchemaWrapper. It makes it possible to drop the KeyedDeserializationSchema in the future without dropping support for SerializationSchema
Verifying this change
Changed existing tests to use the SerializationSchema directly rather than KeyedSerializationSchema (which internally uses the KafkaSerializationSchemaWrapper) whenever possible. The remaining tests that were not ported use the other features of the KeyedSerializationSchema such as writing the key.
This should ensure the processing should work correctly with the wrapper.
Added additional tests for opening the schemas.

commit.message:
[FLINK-18075] Remove deprecation of Kafka producer ctor that take
SerializationSchema

SerializationSchema is an important interface that is widely spread and
used in other components such as Table API. It is also the most common
interface for reusable interfaces. Therefore we should support it long
term in our connectors. This commit removes the deprecation of ctors
that take this interface.

Moreover it adds the most general ctor that takes all producer
configuration options along with SerializationSchema. This makes it
feature equivalent with KafkaSerializationSchema in respect to
configuration of the producer.
